general_advisory: In case of shortage of water, go for alternative row irrigation method for better utilization of water which saves around 50% water. Also the drip irrigation system in Orchard saves water. Sprinkling irrigation method reduces the effect of high temperature.

advisory: Tillering stage - Due to rise in temperature, the BPH attack may be seen, to manage this, make alleys in each meter gap for effective sunlight at the base of the plant, chemically spray Ethofenfrox @ 1 ml per liter of water above ETL.
PI stage - Leaf folder may attack, go for spraying Lambdacyalothrin @ 1 ml per liter of water.
Branching - Due to weather survey the infestation of YMV disease and to manage this apply Ridomil MZ @ 2g/liter of water.
Collect good quality ginger Rhizomes namely Suprava, Suruchi, Suravi. Seed rate is 6-8 q/ac. Each piece should be 20 g and contain 2-3 eyes. Treat the seeds before planting in the field.
Pod Development - Provide irrigation due to rise in temperature at pod development.
Tillering stage - Due to diurnal variation in temperature, after 3-4 weeks of planting finger millet, apply 12 kg of molasses per acre.
Due to rise in temperature provide the animal clean and sufficient drinking water.
Vegetative growth - Due to temperature effect in brinjal foot & shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
Growth stage - Due to rise in temperature, survey for oxygen deficit may be there.
Harvesting stage - Harvest the onion leaving 2-3 cm from the neck and cut all the roots and dry it under shed during high temperature.
